properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from Smith Point to Windmill Point VA; Chesapeake Bay from Windmill Point to New Point Comfort VA
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 12 at 2:24AM EST until February 13 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 20 kt and waves 2 to 4 ft.

* WHERE...Chesapeake Bay from Smith Point to Windmill Point VA
and Chesapeake Bay from Windmill Point to New Point Comfort VA.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 3 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 3 PM EST THURSDAY
